channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 01:38 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Stop by subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 01:38 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region. Stop by subsequent messages.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
